virtual-sensor.name: Jungfraujoch_Dozer_Rssi__mapped
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerRssiMsg) from Jungfraujoch deployment in usable form

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, TIMESTAMP, GENERATION_TIME, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 from Jungfraujoch_Dozer_Rssi__muxed__mapped

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, TIMESTAMP, GENERATION_TIME, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0 as RSSI_NODEID, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 as RSSI from wrapper where PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 is not null
